column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My boss gave me tickets to the Pittsburgh Penguins hockey game .
#text=The penguins play in the Downtown area of my city .
#text=I live in a busy city so driving a car to the downtown area is n't always the best idea .
#text=First , you have to deal with traffic .
#text=After dealing with traffic , you have to find a place to park .
#text=A public bus is usually the quickest way to get to Downtown .
#text=First , I had to go to the bus stop and get a schedule to plan my bus trip .
#text=I did this days in advance , because I was really excited for the game .
#text=After setting the time I would get on the bus , I made sure to arrive 10 minutes early so I do n't miss the bus .
#text=I got on the bus and paid my fare for the trip .
#text=I sat back and let the bus driver take me right to the front entrance of the hockey arena because that 's where the bus stop was .
